text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Community reinvestment assistance" means a loan, assurance, guarantee, grant, payment, credit enhancement, or other assistance provided by the Fund as set forth in § 9-404 of this title, or a commitment to provide the assistance.
"Community reinvestment project" means a project or program eligible under § 9-402 of this title to receive community reinvestment assistance from the Fund.
"Limited income household" means a household or individual whose income does not exceed the upper income limits that the Secretary establishes.
"Member" means a member of the Board.
